column1: Kata Robata////We ordered the chef's mix of sashimi
column2: as well as a few rolls. Sushi is either really good
column3: or really bad in my opinion. I haven't had just ok sushi. Maybe that's a good thing
column4: but the sushi here is above average. Is it the best I've ever had? No. Is it the best I've had in Houston? Yup.
